nature_language: [当前位置杭州,目标位置广州,旅行人数2,旅行天数5] 打算从杭州飞到广州，待五天。我和老婆两个人玩，我们想购物、吃正宗的粤菜，求推荐
nature_language_en: [Current location: Hangzhou, Destination: Guangzhou, Number of travelers: 2, Number of travel days: 5] Planning to fly from Hangzhou to Guangzhou and stay for five days. My wife and I are traveling together, and we want to shop and eat authentic Cantonese cuisine. Any recommendations?
